entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this morning. Rain mixed with snow late this afternoon. Fog along parts of the coast this morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:42 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 08:42 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle. High 10 except plus 5 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10 except plus 5 in onshore winds. Forecast issued 08:42 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
